prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a bug with plant-like features and a green color scheme.
I want a whimsical creature that has a mix of floral and insect characteristics, perfect for forest habitats.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the essence of nature with leafy wings and a sturdy body.
Make a charming bug-type Pokemon with a vibrant green appearance and unique floral traits.
Imagine a Pokemon that blends in with its grassy surroundings, showcasing both insect and plant features.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a small bush with a hidden insect within, thriving in forests.
Show me a nature-inspired Pokemon that has a strong connection to grasslands and trees.
